history.proof: intros T U f H1 H2. apply sysExtend with (T := T). - apply H1. - apply H2.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (T U : System) (f : Formula), Included (fol.Formula LNN) T U -> SysPrf T f -> SysPrf U f

Premises:
LNN = {| Relations := LNNRelation; Functions := LNTFunction; arity := LNNArity |} : Language
Included : forall U : Type, Ensemble U -> Ensemble U -> Prop
System = fol.System LNN : Type
SysPrf = folProof.SysPrf LNN : fol.System LNN -> fol.Formula LNN -> Prop
Module fol := Struct Record Language : Type := language { Relations : Set; Functions : Set; arity : Relations + Functions -> nat } Definition Relations : Language -> Set. Definition Functions : Language -> Set. Definition arity : forall l : Language, Relations l + Functions l -> nat. Inductive Term (L : Language) : Set := var : nat -> Term L | apply : forall f : Functions L, Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> Term L with Terms (L : Language) : nat -> Set := Tnil : Terms L 0 | Tcons : forall n : nat, Term L -> Terms L n -> Terms L (S n) Definition Term_rect : forall (L : Language) (P : Term L -> Type), (forall n : nat, P (var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P (apply L f0 t)) -> forall t : Term L, P t. Definition Term_ind : forall (
Formula = fol.Formula LNN : Set
Axm : forall (T : System) (f : Formula), mem (fol.Formula LNN) T f -> SysPrf T f
sysExtend : forall (L : Language) (T U : fol.System L) (f : fol.Formula L), Included (fol.Formula L) T U -> folProof.SysPrf L T f -> folProof.SysPrf L U f
Ensembles.Add : forall U : Type, Ensemble U -> U -> Ensemble U
Ensembles.In : forall U : Type, Ensemble U -> U -> Prop
mem : forall U : Type, Ensemble U -> U -> Prop
Same_set : forall U : Type, Ensemble U -> Ensemble U -> Prop
Strict_Included : forall U : Type, Ensemble U -> Ensemble U -> Prop
folLogic.Axm : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f : fol.Formula L), mem (fol.Formula L) T f -> folProof.SysPrf L T f
Inductive Union (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) : Ensemble U := Union_introl : forall x : U, Ensembles.In U B x -> Ensembles.In U (Union U B C) x | Union_intror : forall x : U, Ensembles.In U C x -> Ensembles.In U (Union U B C) x Arguments Union _%type_scope Arguments Union_introl _%type_scope Arguments Union_intror _%type_scope
Union_ind : forall (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) (P : U -> Prop), (forall x : U, Ensembles.In U B x -> P x) -> (forall x : U, Ensembles.In U C x -> P x) -> forall u : U, Union U B C u -> P u
sysWeaken : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L), folProof.SysPrf L T f -> folProof.SysPrf L (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula L) T g) f
Empty_set_ind : forall (U : Type) (P : U -> Prop) (u : U), Empty_set U u -> P u
Union_introl : forall (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) (x : U), Ensembles.In U B x -> Ensembles.In U (Union U B C) x
Union_intror : forall (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) (x : U), Ensembles.In U C x -> Ensembles.In U (Union U B C) x
orSys : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g h : fol.Formula L), folProof.SysPrf L (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula L) T f) h -> folProof.SysPrf L (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula L) T g) h -> folProof.SysPrf L (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula L) T (fol.orH L f g)) h
Singleton_ind : forall (U : Type) (x : U) (P : U -> Prop), P x -> forall u : U, Singleton U x u -> P u
Ensemble = fun U : Type => U -> Prop : Type -> Type Arguments Ensemble _%type_scope
impI : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L), folProof.SysPrf L (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula L) T g) f -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L g f)
In_singleton : forall (U : Type) (x : U), Ensembles.In U (Singleton U x) x
andI : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L), folProof.SysPrf L T f -> folProof.SysPrf L T g -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.andH L f g)
orI1 : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L), folProof.SysPrf L T f -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.orH L f g)
andE1 : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.andH L f g) -> folProof.SysPrf L T f
contradiction : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L), folProof.SysPrf L T f -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.notH L f) -> folProof.SysPrf L T g
orE : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g h : fol.Formula L), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.orH L f g) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L f h) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L g h) -> folProof.SysPrf L T h
iffI : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L f g) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L g f) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L f g)
impE : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L g f) -> folProof.SysPrf L T g -> folProof.SysPrf L T f
iffTrans : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g h : fol.Formula L), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L f g) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L g h) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L f h)
impTrans : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g h : fol.Formula L), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L f g) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L g h) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L f h)
Inductive Singleton (U : Type) (x : U) : Ensemble U := In_singleton : Ensembles.In U (Singleton U x) x Arguments Singleton _%type_scope Arguments In_singleton _%type_scope
forallI : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys L v T -> folProof.SysPrf L T f -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.forallH L v f)
iffE1 : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L f g) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L f g)
orI2 : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L), folProof.SysPrf L T g -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.orH L f g)
andE2 : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.andH L f g) -> folProof.SysPrf L T g
nnI : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f : fol.Formula L), folProof.SysPrf L T f -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.notH L (fol.notH L f))
nnE : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f : fol.Formula L), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.notH L (fol.notH L f)) -> folProof.SysPrf L T f
forallSimp : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.forallH L v f) -> folProof.SysPrf L T f
iffE2 : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L f g) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L g f)
andSym : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.andH L f g) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.andH L g f)
iffSym : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L f g) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L g f)
absurd1 : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f : fol.Formula L), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L f (fol.notH L f)) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.notH L f)

```coq
intros T U f H1 H2. apply sysExtend with (T := T).
- apply H1.
- apply H2.
Qed.```
